constituent: bustle, large, St. Bernard, haystack, ten, needle, needle3, ten3
heisigStory: The hustle and bustle of this character is depicted by a St. Bernard dog and a haystack.
koohiiStory1: Hustle and bustle = a big St. Bernard dog frisking about in a haystack, knocking it down and spreading the hay about, after the field hands just stacked it up.
koohiiStory2: A bustle is also the name for the big wire-framed skirts that women used to wear. Here´s a St. Bernard dog jammed ass-first into the top of a haystack, looking like some kind of proper Victorian-era lady as he struggles to get out.
